name: reviews
description: This table contains all user reviews for individual items.

columns.name: item_id
columns.description: ID of an item that was reviewed.

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: ID of a user who left a review.

columns.name: rating
columns.description: Star rating that a user selected in a review form.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when a user left a review.

columns.name: feedback
columns.description: Text feedback that a user types in a review form.
